verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG1: Louisiana Republicans in Congress] [ARGM-DIS: largely] [V: stand] [ARG2: behind President Donald Trump ’s “ zero - tolerance ” immigration enforcement policy] , [ARGM-TMP: even as a growing chorus of critics attack the White House ’s prosecution decisions that]
